chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 12 mini has the above problem: 
The iPhone won't turn on anymore. I've tried restarting the device multiple times, but it gets stuck at the iPhone logo screen and can't be used or restarted again. I've also tried resetting via PC and other methods.

Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt mit iCloud/Google verknüpft.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The device is currently locked by the customer's iCloud account. Inform the customer to unlink their account or we will not be able to proceed with the repair. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile,

FMI is OFF.


Regards,
Sema from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Thank you in assisting the customer on unlinking the device from the iCloud. We will relay this news to our repair team. 

Regards,
CH

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue, and we do not have sufficient stock for an exchange. We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards, 
KW
